膇字的基本解释

膇
zhuì
脚肿：“民愁则垫隘，于是乎有沉溺重膇之疾。”

膇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuì］
［《廣韻》馳僞切，去寘，澄。］
亦作“1”。
(1)脚肿。
(2)喻文辞臃滞。

膇字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　膇； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页990第33
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】馳僞切【正韻】直類切，?音墜。【集韻】足腫也。【正韻】下腫。【左傳·成六年】獻子曰：民愁則墊隘，於是乎有沈溺重膇之疾。【註】重膇，足腫。

膇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
膇字的起名意思

暂无。

swelling of foot
Basic explanation of words
swelling of foot
zhuì
Swollen feet: "The people are sad, so there is a disease of indulging in heavy fatalities."
swelling of foot
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuì］
["Guangyun" cuts falsely, sets and clears. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Swollen feet.
(2) Yu Wenci is bloated.
swelling of foot
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Meat word department] 　膇; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 990 33
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Pseudo-cutting [Zheng Yun] Straight-cutting,? Sound pendant. [Ji Yun] Swollen feet. [Zheng Yun] Swollen underneath. [Zuo Zhuan·Sixth year] Xianzi said: The people are sad, so there is the disease of indulging in heavy fatalities. [Note] Severe fat, swollen feet.
swelling of foot
